tag_list: human-computer-interaction, hci, user-experience-design, ux, ui, user-interface-design, guru
overview:
Early on, Corey mastered Legos, Highlights, and monster sketches. Later he took command of the cardboard, duct tape, and Krazy Glue arts. Today with his web and visual design, electronics and mechanical engineering know-how (and a little bit of zaniness), there are no limits to the ideas his mind dreams up and the creations they lead him to discover. He has big hopes for technology’s role in our livesâ€”how it can alter the way we perceive our world and provide opportunities to interact with one another and our surroundings in new and more meaningful ways.

With a strong love for technology and learning, Corey strives to apply his technical ingenuity and passion for innovation to advance the capabilities and ensure the safety of the human race.
